data.text: @LAGTVNovaWar Hmm, I was comparing the two in another conversation and this wasn't mentioned and I forgot. Very fair point. Once again thank you for the back and forth.
@Dectala There's a reason Bethesda showed a JPEG for ES6 after showing their ES mobile game.

@LAGTVNovaWar I suppose but then, if it's not far enough into development, people will complain about that. I feel this was an appropriate announcement and I feel many fans are upset about a perceived d4 announcment but I feel blizzard never led onto that assumption. All fan hype.

@Dectala I personally don't care that much, this is just an observation.

If this was really a stop gap though, then they would have probably been wise to announce D4 alongside it.

@LAGTVNovaWar I don't fully understand the hate. It's a simple stopgap before the next game and a cash grab. I get not liking it, and maybe that's all this tweet is. But so many are like violently angry and I don't get it. It's on par with the times, mobile games are huge right now.
